org.coniks.coniks_test_client

Class ClientUser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.coniks.coniks_test_client.ConiksUser
      • org.coniks.coniks_test_client.ClientUser

  • public class ClientUser
extends ConiksUser
    Represents the user using a CONIKS client. This is an extension of a regular ConiksUser since the client's user also has an associated username, public key and security policy flags, but also needs access to a corresponding private key used for signing key changes etc.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClientUser(java.lang.String uname, java.lang.String data, java.security.KeyPair kp)
      Initializes the client's user with the username and ConiksUser defaults.

      Loads the user's key change private key from disk.
      void saveChangeKeyPair(java.security.KeyPair kp)
      Saves the new change key pair to disk.
      void unloadChangePrivKey()

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClientUser

        public ClientUser(java.lang.String uname,
                  java.lang.String data,
                  java.security.KeyPair kp)
        Initializes the client's user with the username and ConiksUser defaults.
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • loadChangePrivKey

        public java.security.interfaces.DSAPrivateKey loadChangePrivKey()
        Loads the user's key change private key from disk. The caller should free the key's memory after use.
        Returns:
        the user's DSA private change key or null in case of an error.

      • unloadChangePrivKey

        public void unloadChangePrivKey()
        Unloads the user's key change private key from memory.

      • saveChangeKeyPair

        public void saveChangeKeyPair(java.security.KeyPair kp)
        Saves the new change key pair to disk. This is called every time the client performs some mapping data change and updates the change key.
        Parameters:
        kp - the new change key pair to save.
